3ã€form-urlencoded â€‹

form-urlencoded æ˜¯é€šè¿‡è¡¨å•æäº¤æ•°æ®çš„ä¸€ç§ç¼–ç æ–¹å¼ã€‚åœ¨æŒ‡å®š Content-Type ä¸º application/x-www-form-urlencoded æ—¶ï¼Œä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨å°†è¯·æ±‚æ•°æ®è¿›è¡Œç¼–ç åä¼ é€’ã€‚

å‰ç«¯ä¼ é€’æ—¶ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å€ŸåŠ© qs æˆ–è€… query-string åº“è¿›è¡Œç¼–ç ï¼š

å‚æ•°ä¼ é€’ï¼š

ts
import qs from "qs";

const result = await axios.post(
  "/api/user",
  qs.stringify({
    id: 1,
    name: "å°æ˜",
  }),
  {
    headers: { "content-type": "application/x-www-form-urlencoded" },
  }
);
console.log(result);

4ã€form-data â€‹

form-data é€‚åˆä¸Šä¼ æ–‡ä»¶ç­‰äºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ•°æ®ï¼Œåœ¨æŒ‡å®š Content-Type ä¸º multipart/form-data æ—¶ï¼Œä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨å°†è¯·æ±‚æ•°æ®è¿›è¡Œç¼–ç åä¼ é€’ã€‚

å‰ç«¯ä¼ é€’æ—¶ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å€ŸåŠ© FormData å¯¹è±¡è¿›è¡Œå¤„ç†ï¼š

å‚æ•°ä¼ é€’ï¼š

ts
const formData = new FormData();
formData.append("id", 1);
formData.append("name", "å°æ˜");
formData.append("file", file); // file ä¸ºäºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶

const res = await axios.post("/api/user", data, {
  headers: { "content-type": "multipart/form-data" },
});
console.log(res);
const formData = new FormData();
formData.append("id", 1);
formData.append("name", "å°æ˜");
formData.append("file", file); // file ä¸ºäºŒè¿›åˆ¶æ–‡ä»¶

å‚æ•°æ¥æ”¶ï¼š

ts
import {
  Body,
  Post,
  UseInterceptors,
  UploadedFiles,
} from '@nestjs/common';
import { AnyFilesInterceptor } from '@nestjs/platform-express';

@Post()
@UseInterceptors(
    AnyFilesInterceptor({
      dest: 'uploads/',
    }),
  )
createUser(@Body() createForms: { id:string, name:string }, @UploadedFiles() files: Express.Multer.File[]) {
   console.log(files);
   return JSON.stringify(createForms);
}
import {
  Body,
  Post,
  UseInterceptors,
  UploadedFiles,
} from '@nestjs/common';
import { AnyFilesInterceptor } from '@nestjs/platform-express';

@Post()
@UseInterceptors(
    AnyFilesInterceptor({
      dest: 'uploads/',
    }),
  )
createUser(@Body() createForms: { id:string, name:string }, @UploadedFiles() files: Express.Multer.File[]) {
   console.log(files);
   return JSON.stringify(createForms);
}

}

æ€»ç»“ â€‹

  • query url ä¸­?åé¢çš„å‚æ•°ï¼ŒNest ä¸­é€šè¿‡ @Query() æ¥æ”¶

form urlencodedã€form-dataã€json , éƒ½æ˜¯åœ¨ body ä¸­ä¼ é€’å‚æ•°ï¼š

  • form urlencoded ç±»ä¼¼ query ä¼ å‚ï¼ŒåŒºåˆ«æ˜¯åœ¨ body ä¸­ä¼ é€’å‚æ•°ï¼ŒNest ä¸­é€šè¿‡ @Body() æ¥æ”¶

  • json json æ ¼å¼çš„æ•°æ®ï¼ŒNest ä¸­é€šè¿‡ @Body() æ¥æ”¶

ä¸ºæ­¤é¡µæä¾›ä¿®æ”¹å»ºè®®
